phrases: Hey, all you viewers out there!
When you are watchin' Fairy Tail, make sure to keep the room nice and bright,
and sit back from the screen,'kay?
We managed to defeat Phantom's Element 4 somehow
which stopped the Magic Giant, but Master Jose has come to attack!
Natsu came running to save the captured Lucy,
and started an all-out battle with the Iron Dragon Slayer, Gajeel!
I will yell it out countless times.
I believe your every tomorrow will be shining.
And that is why we are not going to lose!
When it seems like you will be blown away by the headwinds,
grasp this hand, try to take a chance.
Because you are not alone anymore, got it?
Do not give up on your awesome dream!
That is right, do not cry!
Now, with the light shining down upon you.
Do not even think about something like giving up!
Even if you trade being hurt again for strength.
Your eyes, always looking straight ahead,
It is so easy to lure you out, Salamader.
That is'because you keep playing dirty, Iron Dragon!
I have never seen Natsu like that.
But Natsu is really powerful right now.
You are sure actin' uppity, trash.
So I am going to bend that face of yours and turn it into iron filings.
What is that dangerous looking thing?
There is nothing that will not be cut to sheds when hit with this!
I want to test how well this cuts on you, Salamander!
It is Iron Dragon Slayer Magic!
We are caught up in it again!
Cannot stop it now like you did before, huh?
I thought you said it are not nothing!
You actually move pretty well there.
That last time was just the preliminaries, after all.
Now I am fired up, you scrap-iron bastard!
Both of them are Dragon Slayers who can transform their bodies to take on characteristics of dragons!
For two human Dragon Slayer wizards to battle...
Hard Fist of the Iron Dragon!
We are caught up in it a third time!
Natsu was bruised with just one hit?
Those scales are made of the hardest steel.
That is the air pressure from his kick?
Those steel scales have doubled the strength of his attacks!
These steel scales render all your attacks powerless!
It does not hurt, damn it!
That is enough pretending you are okay!
He can use a breath attack,too!
That is the 4th time we are caught up in it.
It looks like the difference in the two dragons is obvious now, Salamander.
Even if your flaming breath can wipe out enemies,
against steal it does not even make a scratch.
But my breath of iron blades has torn your body to shreds.
Sure you are not a bit groggy?
My flames are not just any fire!
The flames of the Fire Dragon destroy everything!
If you do not get serious, I will crush you to pieces, Gajeel the Iron Dragon!
Neither of them were being serious?
And wait, why did they strip?
There is not enough room in the sky for two dragons!
I will drop you, Natsu the Salamander!
What is with the creepy hand movement?
That is what you are worried about?
He is keeping up with Gajeel like that!
Now we are getting caught up in it!
Now that I have eaten, I am all revved up!
He is suddenly full of energy!
Slayers can restore their energy and power up by eating their respective element!
Then Natsu needs to eat fire!
Natsu cannot eat his own magic flames!
I will tear you to shreds!
Did I have a fire Spirit?
The only one I have on hand is the new one, Sagittarius.
I have not made a contract yet, but...
But this is the only chance we have got!
I am linked to the path to the world of Celestial Spirits!
O Spirit, answer my call and pass through the Gate!
Gate of the Archer, I open thee!
I will explain the details later!
For I am an archer, as it were!
It is dangerous, so get back!
Now now, look on the bright side.
Do not have any power on an empty stomach?
I have got no more use for you.
I could not stand Natsu losing!
Take a look at what is happening to what you are trying to protect!
Nobody even knows if they exist in the first place.
That is why it is an eternal mystery.
That is the meaning behind the name.
I do not really get it, but awesome!
I do not like your look.
Oh, you are just a freak!
Who are you callin' a freak, squinty eyes!
I am talkin' about you, droopy eyes!
That is how it should be.
You think I am going to quit?
Everyone who comes to Fairy Tail are like family.
A family's house is not a place to fight.
I am going to go do this job!
You do understand what that request says, right?
Something is something at something, maybe?
You did not read it at all!
All you understood was the reward, idiot.
I just do not get what is written here!
I remember all the names of food!
Well excuse me for only knowing names of food!
Igneel really taught me the letters...
It is nothing to be embarrassed about.
In this world there are an endless number of words, after all.
If you do not know them, then you should learn them, that is all.
I am just going to teach you some vocabulary...
You want to go, General Snot?
Think of me as Igneel the 2nd.
I will pound into you all the necessary vocabulary to live as a Fairy Tail wizard in three days!
Until that time I will not allow you to eat, drink, or sleep!
I am going to do this thing!
So, do you like the guild, Natsu?
Erza's scary, but other than that, it is all super fun!
And I remember lots and lots of words!
What are you talkin' about all of a sudden?
I wish this instant would last forever...
He is like a bluebird of happiness!
Then I will name him Happy!
You will be able to do S-class's yourself before you know it, Natsu.
But when you do, I will support you.
Until that time, you do your best to protect Fairy Tail, okay?
I know I do not seem like it, but I am actually a wizard myself!
The one I want to get into, see, has like a ton of amazing wizards, and...
Then come with me to our guild!
One cannot progress in the way of magic by being mindful of the watchful eye from above!
Follow the path you believe in!
That is what it means to be a Fairy Tail wizard!
But, I still want to be in the guild...
If... If they have me, then...
Natsu has not given up yet.
But, any more of this, and I...
I really hate holding back, you see...
I do not know what might happen to you.
Destroying Jupiter, battling fiercely with the Element 4...
He used up too much magic power!
If only he could eat some flames, Natsu would not lose to anybody!
It seems I had a slight misunderstanding, as it were.
You inquired whether I could shoot fire, Madame Lucy, and I replied, No.
However what is crucial at this point is not shooting fire, but the fire itself, am I right?
Flames from causing the machines to explode!
Depending on how one shoots, it is possible to pierce through or shatter, as it were.
What the hell is that horse-ish thing?
You are like a genius archer, Sagittarius!
But where are you saluting too?
Do not get all full of yourself just because you ate some fire!
Now he is at full power!
Levy, Jet, Droy, Gramps, Lucy, my friends...
He deflected my breath with just his bare hands?
How much do you got to hurt others before you people are satisfied?
I am going to pay you back for everything!
I will show you that picking a fight with Fairy Tail was a mistake!
What ever happened to our punishment from going on that S-class quest without permission?
Hey, do not remind people of that!
But we have to prepare ourselves, or...
Why do not we get them to change the rule about not going on S-class quests?
You go talk to the master about that, Natsu.
I am kind of busy today...
I am just, um, heading out for a bit...
